sections.heading: Streamlit Caching
sections.content: Use @st.cache_data to cache expensive computations and @st.cache_resource to cache global resources like database connections. This prevents re-computation on every app rerun and improves performance significantly.

sections.heading: Input Validation - Security
sections.content: Validate all user inputs on both client and server sides. Use allowlists, sanitize data, and implement proper encoding. Protect against SQL injection, XSS, and other injection attacks.

sections.heading: Database Transactions - Data Management
sections.content: Use ACID transactions to ensure data consistency. Implement proper isolation levels (READ COMMITTED, SERIALIZABLE) based on use case. Handle deadlocks and implement retry logic for transient failures.

sections.heading: Kubernetes Ingress - Networking
sections.content: Ingress manages external access to services in a cluster. It provides HTTP and HTTPS routing, SSL termination, and name-based virtual hosting. Requires an Ingress Controller to function.
